patterns: what mobile brands do you repair at sampurnakart
responses: Sampurnakart offers repair services for all major mobile phone brands, including Samsung, Apple (iPhone), Oppo, Vivo, Xiaomi, Realme, OnePlus, and many others.

patterns: can i repair my mobile phone online or do i need to visit the shop
responses: yes we offer services for all mobile phone brands, no matter the make or model, whether its a flagship device or a budget phone, we've got you coveredYes, you can book a mobile repair service online through our website or app. We offer both doorstep repair services and pickup/drop-off options, so you don’t need to visit the shop.

patterns: can you repair my phone at my doorstep
responses: yes we offer doorstep repair services fir a wide range of mobile phone and laptop issues.A certified technician will vist your location to repair your device on-site

patterns: what is the price range for mobile phone repair
phone cost repair
price range for mobile phone repair
responses: The cost of mobile repairs varies based on the type of issue and the phone model. Prices generally range from ₹500 for minor repairs to ₹5,000 or more for complex issues like motherboard repairs. You can get a detailed quote before booking.

patterns: do you offer repair services for all mobile phone brands
responses: yes we offer services for all mobile phone brands, no matter the make or model, whether its a flagship device or a budget phone, we've got you covered

patterns: is there a warranty on mobile phon repair
responses: yes we offer a warranty on all mobile phone repairs. The warranty period depends on the type of repair, but typically it lasts for 3 to 6 months

patterns: how do i cancel or reschedule a mobile reapir booking
responses: you can cancel or reschedule your mobile repair by logging into your account on the sampurnakart app or webite.Simply go to the "My bookings" section and select the option to cancel or modify your booking

patterns: what is the price range for mobile phone repairs
responses: The cost of mobile repairs varies based on the type of issue and the phone model. Prices generally range from ₹500 for minor repairs to ₹5,000 or more for complex issues like motherboard repairs. You can get a detailed quote before booking.

patterns: do you offer any discount or special deals on mobile repair
responses: yes we frequently offer discount and special deals on mobile repair. Keep an eye on our website or app for ongoing offers and seasonal promotions

patterns: do you offer pickup and drop service for mobile repairs
responses: yes sampurnakart offer a convenient pickup and drop service for mobile repair.We will collect your phone from your location, repair it and return it to you.

patterns: how can i track the progress of my mobile repair
intents.responses: you can track the status of your mobile repair through the sampurnakart app or website. We provide real-time updates, so you'll know when your repair is completed and on its way back to you

patterns: how much time does the mobile repair takes
responses: The time taken for mobile phone repair is typically between a few hours to 2-3 days depending on the complexity of the issue and parts availablilit,

responses: What kind of repair you want to book Here are some of the link that I can Suggest you Smartphone Brands Laptop Brands Tablet Brands Smart Watches Heaphones Brand Speakers LED TV CC TV Services Car Services

patterns: About Sampurnakart
What is Sampurnakart about?
responses: At Sampurnakart Innovation Pvt. Ltd., we're not just a repair service we're a team of tech enthusiasts dedicated to providing seamless solutions for all your gadget woes. With a mission to revolutionize the repair industry, we're committed to delivering excellence, affordability, and convenience to every customer.

When you choose Sampurnakart, you're choosing quality you can rely on. We promise to treat your device with the utmost care and attention it deserves, using state-of-the-art tools and genuine parts to ensure optimal performance. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we won't rest until your device is back in your hands, functioning flawlessly.

patterns: promise in sampurnakart
responses: When you choose Sampurnakart, you're choosing quality you can rely on. We promise to treat your device with the utmost care and attention it deserves, using state-of-the-art tools and genuine parts to ensure optimal performance. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we won't rest until your device is back in your hands, functioning flawlessly.

patterns: what are the privacy policy in sampurnakart
responses:
How We Collect or Get Your Data
When you use our Platform, we collect and store your information which is provided by you from time to time. In general, you can browse the Platform without telling us who you are or revealing any personal information about yourself. Once you give us your personal information, you are not anonymous to us. Where possible, we indicate which fields are required and which fields are optional. You always have the option to not provide information by choosing not to use a particular service, product, or feature on the Platform.

Visit our website (www.SAMPURNAKART.in) and/or any other SAMPURNAKART website(s) which reference or link to this Statement (collectively, “Website”).
Use, download, access, as applicable, any of our various internet-based offerings, including mobile platforms, software, or applications (collectively, “Services”).
Visit SAMPURNAKART's branded social media sites.
Receive communications from us, including emails, phone calls, or other electronic messages; or Data we collect.
We collect some information directly from you (for example, via forms you complete or products or Services you access, download, or otherwise obtain). Such information is generally limited to:
Name, Contact details, Email ID, IMEI, Device Details
Your communications with SAMPURNAKART personnel.
Content you post on our social media sites.
Information you provide on the Website, such as online questionnaires, or feedback forms.
Information you provide when you subscribe to SMS services.
Information you provide when you create your account, log-in credentials, and information about your use of and preferences for the Services.
Other information is received indirectly from you via use of the Services (for example, from observing your actions on the Website or to provision you with account access).

patterns: what are the terms and conditions of sampurnakart
terms and conditions of sampurnakart
responses:
By accepting this you agree with OUR terms and conditions as follows:
Estimated Repair Costs: The repair price shown in the app and website is estimated and may change based on the actual diagnosis.
Price Fluctuations: Repair prices may change over time according to market conditions.
Payment Terms: An estimated tentative cost is derived based on initial customer input. The actual cost of the repair will be informed to the customer through phone or email after detailed diagnosis. 100% payment should be made before SAMPURNAKART starts the repair.
Additional Repairs: If additional essential repairs are identified during the repair process, a fresh estimation will be sent. Customer approval with 100% advance payment of the balance is essential to complete the repair. If the customer requests the equipment to be returned without repair, the same will be accepted only if the SAMPURNAKART diagnosis charges are paid. If any spare parts have already been procured from the vendor for repair, payment made earlier towards the repair will not be refunded to the customer. Repair diagnosis charges vary for each product based on complexity.
Repair Turnaround Time: All efforts will be made to ensure that the product is repaired within 3 working days from the date of acceptance of repair. However, if the repair is complex or if there is any constraint on spare parts availability, the repair turnaround time may take longer. SAMPURNAKART will not be responsible for any loss due to this delay. If the spare parts are not available with the vendor, the product will be returned to the customer without any repair. In such a case, diagnosis charges are still applicable for chargeable repair.
Damage Liability: While every effort will be made to ensure proper care of your product, SAMPURNAKART will not be held responsible for any kind of losses occurring due to unforeseen circumstances described as "Act of God". Accessories are accepted under the owner's risk.
Collection of Repaired Products: All repaired products should be collected within 2 weeks from the date of intimation through email or SMS. In case of delay, Rs 100 will be charged for every extra day. If the product is not collected by the customer within 45 days from the last date of the penalty period of 2 weeks, the product will be considered as junk and will be disposed of by SAMPURNAKART. SAMPURNAKART will not be responsible for returning the product.
Data Backup: Upon confirmation of acceptance of repair, we expect the customer to have a backup of all data. SAMPURNAKART will not be held responsible for any kind of data loss.
Replacement Parts: In case of replacement for screens or body parts, only the screen of the device will be replaced. Screen guards, sleeves, stickers, or any cosmetic modifications to the original device will not be replaced.
Operating System Installation: SAMPURNAKART may install the operating system as part of hardware/software service, which will prevent the device from reverting to an earlier version of the operating system. Third-party applications installed on such devices may not be compatible with the updated operating system. Customers are responsible for reinstalling all other software programs, data, and passwords post-repair.
Service Provider Status: We are not a Brand Authorized Service Provider. SAMPURNAKART is an Independent Service Provider. All phone repairs we perform carry a 1-month warranty. We use high-quality OEM spare parts, meaning original equipment manufacturer parts. None of our spare parts come directly from Apple or other brands. Warranty does not cover physical, accidental, or liquid damage.
Complete Information: Customers must provide complete information about the problem at the time of submitting the device for repair. SAMPURNAKART will not repair issues that were not reported.
Pre-existing Conditions: SAMPURNAKART is not responsible for pre-existing conditions, damage, issues, or any kind of problems in the device.
Quality Checks: We accept your device for repair after a quality check and perform a quality check before handing it over to the customers.
Post-Repair Damage: We are not responsible for any physical damage that occurs to the device after handing it over to the customer.
Risk Communication: All risks and challenges related to the repair are communicated with the customer before device repair.
Complex Repairs: In case of any complex repair, the company shall not take any risk over the device repair. The job shall be done only when permitted by the client's (customer's) end. In case of failure, the company shall not be responsible.
Liability: SAMPURNAKART shall not be liable for any kind of claims, risks, and blames as all the repair work is done by customer’s consent. We only start repair work if the customer agrees with all the terms and conditions and is aware of all kinds of risks that may occur during the repair.

patterns: what are the shipping policy in sampurnakart
responses:
Introduction
At Sampurnakart Innovations Private Limited, we are committed to delivering your repaired devices promptly and securely. This Shipping Policy outlines our procedures for handling, shipping, and delivering your devices to ensure a seamless experience.

Shipping Information
We provide shipping services for the pickup and delivery of your devices. Below are the details of our shipping processes:

Pickup Timing: We pick up devices from customers between 9:00 AM and 11:59 AM.
Delivery Timing: After repair, devices are delivered back to customers within 3 hours to 3 working days, depending on the nature of the repair.
Shipping Partners: We partner with reliable shipping providers like Delhivery to ensure safe and timely delivery.

Shipping Costs
We strive to keep our shipping costs transparent and affordable. Here's how shipping costs are determined:
Standard Shipping: Complimentary for all repair services.
Express Shipping: Available at an additional cost for faster delivery within 24 hours.
International Shipping: Shipping costs for international deliveries are calculated based on the destination and the size of the device.

Tracking Your Shipment
Once your device has been shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to monitor the status of your shipment in real-time through our shipping partner's website.
If you do not receive a tracking number within 24 hours of your device being shipped, please contact our Customer Service team for assistance.

Shipping Restrictions
Please be aware of the following restrictions related to shipping:
Prohibited Items: We cannot ship hazardous materials, including flammable liquids, batteries, and other restricted items.
Customs Regulations: International shipments are subject to customs regulations and may incur additional fees or delays.
Packaging: Devices must be properly packaged to prevent damage during transit. We handle the packaging process to ensure your device is secure.

Lost or Damaged Shipments
While we strive to ensure that all shipments arrive safely and on time, issues can occasionally occur. In the event of a lost or damaged shipment:
Report Immediately: Contact our Customer Service team within 48 hours of the expected delivery date.
Provide Details: Submit your tracking number and a description of the issue.
Resolution: We will work with our shipping partners to locate your shipment or arrange for a replacement if necessary.

Returns and Exchanges
If you need to return or exchange a device, please follow our return procedures:

Contact Us: Reach out to our Customer Service team to initiate the return or exchange process.
Provide Information: Submit your order number, device details, and reason for the return or exchange.
Approval: Once your request is approved, you will receive instructions on how to ship the device back to us.
Shipping: Follow the provided instructions to return the device. Ensure it is properly packaged to prevent damage.
Processing: Upon receipt, we will inspect the device and process the return or exchange accordingly.
Please note that return shipping costs may apply unless the return is due to our error or a defective product.

patterns: do you repair all laptop brands at sampurnakart
what laptops do you repair
brands of laptop do you repair
all laptop brands do you repair
name of all laptop brands that you repair
responses: Yes, we repair all major laptop brands, including Dell, HP, Lenovo, Apple (MacBook), Acer, Asus, MSI, and others.

patterns: how can i book a laptop repair service with sampurnakart
book my laptop repair service
laptop repair booking
responses: You can easily book a laptop repair service through the Sampurnakart app or website.Simply select your laptop brand and model, describe the issue, and choose a convenient services option

patterns: can i get my laptop repaired online or do i have to vist the shop
do i have to vist the shop to repair my laptop
pickup dropoff service avaliable
responses: you don't need to visit the shop.You can book an online repair service, and we'll either send a technician to your doorstep or offer pickup/dropoff services

patterns: I need to book a repiar
repair booking
booking cost for my device
responses: Select the repair you want to book.Click Here

patterns: how can i book a mobile or laptop repair through the sampurnakart app
book my repair through the app
book my repair through the website
responses: To book a repair, download the Sampurnakart app, create an accout (or login), select the device you need repaired, describe the issue and choose a service option(doorstep repair or pickup/dropoff).

patterns: can i schedule my repair online through your website
responses: Yes, you can schedule a repair online through the Sampurnakart website.Simply follow the same stpes as on the app: choose your device describe the issue and select a service time

patterns: do i need an account to book a repair via Sampurnakart  app or website
responses: while creating an account is optional, it's recommended for faster booking, easy tracking of repair status and managing your future booking. You can also book as a guest.

patterns: how do i apply a promo code or discount while booking a repair online
responses: You can apply a promo code or discount at the checkout stage.Enter the code in the provided field to avail of any offers.

patterns: can i choose a repair time slot while booking online
responses: Yes, you can select a time slot that works best for you while booking your repair online, either via the website or the app

patterns: is it safe to make payments for repair via your website or app
responses: Yes, we use secure payment gateway to ensure that all transactions are encrypted and safe.You can pay with credit/debit cards, or other secure methods.

patterns: how do i provide feedback about the repair service i received
responses: You can provide feedback directly through the sampurnakart app or website.We value your feedback and use it to improve our services

patterns: do you have a live chat option for customers support
responses: Yes, we have a live chat feature on our app and website where you can get real-time assistance from out support team
